org.apache.flex.compiler.tree.as

Interface ITypedNode

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IASNode, IDefinitionNode, ISourceLocation
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccessorNode, BaseTypedDefinitionNode, BaseVariableNode, ChainedVariableNode, ConfigConstNode, FunctionNode, GetterNode, ParameterNode, SetterNode, VariableNode

    public interface ITypedNode
extends IDefinitionNode
    An AST node representing a declaration that can have a type annotation.

    The relevant subinterfaces are IVariableNode, IFunctionNode, and IParameterNode.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.apache.flex.compiler.common.ISourceLocation

        UNKNOWN

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IExpressionNode getTypeNode()
      Returns the child node that contains the type information for this node.
      int getTypeOperatorEnd()
      Returns the end offset of the type operator, which in AS3 is the ':' char.
      int getTypeOperatorStart()
      Returns the start offset of the type operator, which in AS3 is the ':' char.
      boolean hasTypeOperator()
      Returns true if this item has an associated type.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.flex.compiler.tree.as.IDefinitionNode

        getContainingFilePath, getDefinition, getMetaInfos, getMetaTags, getName, getNameAbsoluteEnd, getNameAbsoluteStart, getNameEnd, getNameExpressionNode, getNamespace, getNameStart, getPackageName, getQualifiedName, getShortName, hasModifier, hasNamespace, isImplicit

    • Method Detail

      • hasTypeOperator

        boolean hasTypeOperator()
        Returns true if this item has an associated type. Types are optional in AS3.
        Returns:
        true if we have a type

      • getTypeOperatorStart

        int getTypeOperatorStart()
        Returns the start offset of the type operator, which in AS3 is the ':' char.
        Returns:
        the start offset of the type operator

      • getTypeOperatorEnd

        int getTypeOperatorEnd()
        Returns the end offset of the type operator, which in AS3 is the ':' char.
        Returns:
        the end offset of the type operator

      • getTypeNode

        IExpressionNode getTypeNode()
        Returns the child node that contains the type information for this node.
        Returns:
        An IExpressionNode or null.
